Rooms

{{room.name}}
View
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { RoomDto } from '../models/room.dto'; import { RoomImageDto } from '../models/room.dto'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { ApiserviceService } from '../apiservice.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-rooms', templateUrl: './rooms.component.html', styleUrls: ['./rooms.component.css'] }) export class RoomsComponent implements OnInit{ rooms$!: Observable; constructor(private roomService: ApiserviceService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.rooms$ = this.roomService.getAllRooms(); } }
